articles.author: Lizzy Becherano
articles.title: USA gets Copa America momentum back with Brazil draw - ESPN
articles.description: United States coach Gregg Berhalter called his team's 1-1 draw with star-studded Brazil on Wednesday night a "little step" on the road to success ahead of Copa America. He also said "we're ready."
articles.content:
Jun 12, 2024, 11:34 PM ET

articles.title: US inflation cools as interest rates held - BBC.com
articles.description: America's central bank scaled back forecasts for cuts in 2024 despite annual inflation easing.
articles.content:
By Charlotte Edwards, BBC Business reporter
The US Federal Reserve has signalled that it will cut its key interest rate just once this year despite inflation easing.
